 2014-04762014-04-28,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration of DEBORAH MORRISH, a full-time member (Toronto) of the Immigration and Refugee Board, acting as Deputy Chairperson, Refugee Appeal Divison, effective November 4, 2013 until such time as she is no longer required to act as Deputy Chairperson.
